column2: "Na ɔkɔm bi baa David aber do mfe ebiasa toaa do; na David kɔr EWURADZE hɔ ebisa. Na EWURADZE see dɛ
column3: Saul ntsi a
column4: na no bɔgya fi no ntsi a

column2: "Na ɔhen no frɛɛ Gibeonfo no
column3: na ɔsee hɔn dɛ; (na Gibeonfo no wɔnnyɛ Israelmba no mu bi
column4: na mbom Amorifo nkaase no mu bi a; na Israelmba no aka ntam akyerɛ hɔn: na Saul hwehwɛɛ dɛ oku hɔn wɔ no mbɔdzen a ɔbɔ wɔ Israel na Judamba no ho:)"

column2: "na David see Gibeonfo no dɛ
column3: Ebɛnadze na menyɛ memma hom

column2: "Na Gibeonfo no see no dɛ
column3: Nnyɛ dwetɛ anaa sikasɛm bi na ɔda hɛn na Saul
column4: anaa ne fi ntamu; nkyii so nnyɛ hɛnara bi na yeruboku Israel mu nyimpa biara. Na David see dɛ

column2: "Na wɔsee ɔhen no dɛ
column3: ɔbarimba no a ɔhyeew hɛn
column5: dɛ wɔnsɛɛ hɛn ma hɛn ase nhyew mfi Israel ahe do beebiara no
column7: "ma wonyi ne mbabanyin mu nyimpa beesuon mma hɛn
column9: wɔ Saul a EWURADZE saan mu faa no
column10: ne Gibea no mu. Na ɔhen no see dɛ

column2: "Na ɔhen no gyee Saul ne ba Jonatan ne ba Mefiboset nkwa
column3: osian EWURADZE ne ntam a ɔda hɔn ntamu ntsi
column4: dza ɔda David na Saul ne ba Jonatan ntamu no a."

column2: "Mbom ɔhen no faa Aia ne babaa Rizpa ne mbabanyin beenu no a ɔwoo hɔn maa Saul no
column3: Armoni na Mefiboset; na Saul ne babaa Mikal ne mbabanyin beenum no a ɔwoo hɔn maa Meholatnyi Adriel

column2: "na oyii hɔn hyɛɛ Gibeonfo no nsa
column3: na wɔsɛɛn hɔn bepɔw no do wɔ EWURADZE enyim
column4: na hɔn beesuon no nyinara bɔɔ mu totɔree: na wokum hɔn wɔ twaber nda no mu
column5: nda a odzi kan no mu a
column6: atoko twaber ahyɛse no mu a."

column2: "Na Ahia ne babaa Rizpa faa eyitam
column3: na ɔtsɛɛw mu kataa ɔbotan no do maa noho
column4: fi twaber ahyɛse no ara kodur dɛ nsu fi sor guguu hɔn do ana; na ɔamma kwan ma wimu nnoma ammbɛgyegye hɔn do adzekyee
column5: na hamu mbowa so ammba hɔn do adzesaa."

column2: "Na wɔkɛkaa dza Aia ne babaa Rizpa
column3: Saul no nwewe no

column2: "Na David sii mu kɔree kɛgyee Saul ne mbiew na ne ba Jonatan ne mbiew no wɔ Jabes-gileadfo hɔ
column3: hɔn a wokowiaa hɔn wɔ Bɛt-san abɔntsen do mbrɛ Filistiafo no dze hɔn sensɛnee
column4: wɔ da a Filistiafo kum Saul wɔ Gilboa no:"

column2: "na ɔdze Saul ne mbiew na ne ba Jonatan ne mbiew no fii hɔ bae; na wɔboaboaa hɔn a wɔsensɛɛn hɔn no hɔn mbiew no ano."
"Na wosiee Saul na ne ba Jonatan hɔn mbiew no wɔ Benjamin asaase do wɔ Zela
column3: wɔ n'egya Kis n'asamandan mu: na wɔyɛɛ dza ɔhen no hyɛe no nyinara. Na ɔno n'ekyir no Nyankopɔn tsiei maa asaase no."

column2: "Na Filistiafo no wɔnye Israel nyaa ko bio; na David na no nkowaa ka no ho sianee kɔree
column3: na wɔnye Filistiafo no kɔkoe: na David tɔɔ bahaw."

column2: "Isbi-benob a
column3: ɔyɛ ɔkraban no ne mba no mu bi a ne peaa no dur woker a
column5: na ɔdze afona fofor abɔ ntsi

column2: "Na Zeruia ba Abishai boaa no
column3: na ɔbɔɔ Filistianyi no
column4: na okum no. Nna David ne mbarimba no kaa ntam guu no do
column6: Mma nnye hɛn mmfir edzi nnkɔ nkɔko bio

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ iyi n'ekyir no
column3: wɔnye Filistiafo no nya ɔko bio wɔ Gob; nna Husatnyi Sibekai kum Saf a ɔyɛ ɔkraban no ne mba no mu bi no."

column2: "Na wɔnye Filistiafo no nyaa ɔko bio wɔ Gob; na Bɛtlɛhɛmnyi Elhanan
column3: Jaare-oregim ne ba no
column4: okum Gitinyi Goliat a ne peaa no kura tse dɛ ɔtanwemfo n'asadua."

column2: "Na ɔko baa bio wɔ Gat
column3: mbrɛ ɔbarimba pankor bi a ɔwɔ nsakum do nsatseaba esia esia
column4: na anansa do anansɔba esia esia ma no dodow yɛ eduonu anan; na ɔno so wɔwoo no maa ɔkraban."

column2: "Na aber a orutwitwa Israel mpoa no
column3: David no nua Simei ne ba Jonatan kum no."

column2: "Woyinom baa nan yi wɔwowoo hɔn maa akraban no wɔ Gat; na wɔtotɔree wɔ David
column3: na no nkowaa no hɔn nsaano."
